DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effect food pharmacokinetics apixaban administer commercial image tablet .
DOC.brief_title: Food Effect Study For Apixaban Commercial Image Tablets
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer History evidence abnormal bleed coagulation disorder ( eg , easy bruise gingival bleeding , prolong bleed dental extraction , postpartum , trauma , wound surgery ) and/or first degree relative 50 year age history abnormal bleeding coagulation disorder
